articles.title: Nothing plagues LeBron James like Stephen Curry and the Warriors - The Guardian
articles.description: Best player of his generation should have nothing to prove. And yet Golden State always seem to end up standing in his way
articles.content: In his 20th NBA season LeBron James has officially reached the ageist chapter of his heros journey. Since passing Kareem Abdul-Jabbar to become the NBAs all-time leading scorer, the 38-year-old hasnt… [+11745 chars]
